Title: Sheer Lace Cocktail Dress with Corded Applique

Featured-image: 1969-teal-sheer-lace-cocktail-dress-with-corded-applique_p.jpg

----

Description: This above the knee look features a three quarter length sleeves and the lace gown is overlaid with a sheer fabric that is appliqued with a corded design. A high neckline complements that above the knee look. Perfect for cocktail hour or an evening out.
